QuestData.Title: Gobbles!
QuestData.Description: At last! Zhe time has come to set my Gobbles free of zhat nasty curse!$b$bPay attention now, $r, and stay on guard. Zhere can be no interruptions vhile I perform zhe ritual.$b$bLet me know vhen you haf secured zhe perimeter!$b$bNow, move it!
QuestData.LogDescription: Schnottz wants you to speak with him when you are prepared to witness the ritual.
QuestData.RewardText: That was probably not the transformation Schnottz was hoping for...
